strapiEvent.name: How to Grow a Strawberry Bed
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Come learn how to grow strawberries with us! Strawberries are the most popular small fruit grown in home gardens for many reasons. This class discussion will help you decide what variety is best for your needs and give you an understanding of the cultural requirements that strawberries need to produce the tastiest berries.

All participants will go home with a bundle of strawberry bare roots to start their own garden!

$25/members or $35/nonmembers
